pkgmetadata.longdescription: Estimating Count Data Distributions with Discrete Optimal Symmetric Kernel // Implementation of Discrete Symmetric Optimal Kernel for estimating count data distributions, as described by T. Senga Kiess and G. Durrieu (2024) doi:10.1016/j.spl.2024.110078.The nonparametric estimator using the discrete symmetric optimal kernel was illustrated on simulated data sets and a real-word data set included in the package, in comparison with two other discrete symmetric kernels.
